closeChat.description: Programmatically mark a chat as closed by its chat_id.

findChat.description: Look up a chat by parameters such as chat_id, phone, name, etc.

props.name: label
props.description: Filter by labels assigned to the chat

props.name: group
props.description: Filter by whether the chat is a group chat

props.name: responsible
props.description: Filter by the user responsible for the chat (email)

props.name: name
props.description: Filter by the name of the chat

props.name: read
props.description: Filter by whether the chat is marked as read

props.name: closed
props.description: Filter by whether the chat is closed

props.name: chatgpt_autoresponse_enabled
props.description: Filter by whether ChatGPT autoresponse is enabled for the chat

props.name: created_after
props.description: Filter chats created after this date

props.name: created_before
props.description: Filter chats created before this date

props.name: page
props.description: Page number for paginated results

findMessageStatus.description: Lookup a messageâ€™s delivery status by message ID.

props.name: message_uid
props.description: The unique identifier of the message to look up.

findMessage.description: Lookup a message by its WhatsApp message ID.

props.name: message_uid
props.description: The unique identifier of the message to find.

findUploadedFile.description: Locate an uploaded file by filename or identifier.

props.name: filename
props.description: The name of the uploaded file to search for.

findWhatsappAccount.description: Search for a WhatsApp account (by phone or ID).

props.name: id
props.description: The unique identifier of the WhatsApp account to search for.

props.name: phone
props.description: The phone number associated with the WhatsApp account to search for.

sendFileToExistingChat.description: Similar to above: send a file attachment to a chat using URL or file input and name.

props.name: file
props.description: The file to be sent in the chat.

sendMessageToExistingChat.description: Sends a text message in a chat identified by chat_id

props.name: text
props.description: The text content of the message to be sent.

props.name: file
props.description: Optional file to send with the message.

props.name: label
props.description: Optional label to categorize or tag the message.

props.name: attachment_template_id
props.description: Optional ID of the attachment template to use for the message.

sendMessageToNewChat.description: Create a new chat (new conversation) by specifying the WhatsApp account, phone number, and message.

props.name: contactType
props.description: Select the type of contact identifier

props.name: contact
props.description: Select the contact identifier based on the chosen contact type

props.name: phone
props.description: A phone number formatted to the international standard: [+][country code][area code][local phone number].

props.name: jid
props.description: WhatsApp ID (JID) of a contact or group, e.g. '123456789@s.whatsapp.net'.

props.name: text
props.description: The text message to be sent in the chat.

props.name: file
props.description: The file to be sent in the chat.

props.name: label
props.description: An optional label to categorize the chat.

props.name: chat_name
props.description: An optional name for the chat (useful for group chats).

props.name: attachment_template_id
props.description: Optional ID of a predefined attachment template to use when sending files.

sendUploadedFileToExistingChat.displayName: Send Uploaded File to Existing Chat
sendUploadedFileToExistingChat.description: Send a file (media/attachment) to a chat, with metadata like file name, via existing chat.

chatClosed.description: Fires when a chat is closed.

newIncomingChat.description: Fires when a new incoming chat (i.e. from a user) is created.

newOutgoingChat.description: Fires when a new outgoing chat is initiated.

newReceivedMessage.description: Fires when a message is received (incoming).

newSentMessage.description: Fires when a message is sent (outgoing).

newUploadedFile.description: Fires when a new file is uploaded in a chat.

newWhatsappAccount.description: Fires when a new WhatsApp account is added/registered.
